SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

sudoku.si
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  sudoku.si.Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsoleLogger, FileLogger
public class Logger
extends Object

An abstract parent class for Loggers whose static getInstance() method determines what type of Logger to create, creates it, and gives that Logger's instance back to the caller.

Field Summary

          The default logger used as a default value for getting logger configuration.

Method Detail

find

public static Logger find()
Finds a Logger object based on implicit code context. The context is where in the code this method is called, either at the method, the class or the package level.

Returns:
the implicitly named Logger object.

find

private static Logger find(String name)
Finds a Logger object based on explicit code context.

Parameters:
name - the context name
Returns:
the explicitly named Logger object.

getContext

protected static String getContext()
Gets the context of this logger (where it was called from) at the class level.

getMethodContext

protected String getMethodContext()
Gets the method context (the method where the log method was called).

Returns:
the method context name.

log

void log(String message,
         int level)
Internal method that checks to see if the log level is sufficiently high to log the message (with a call to logMessage(String)).

Parameters:
message - the message to be logged.
level - the verbosity level of the message.

logMessage
